    • Uses of SessionStore in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request

      Classes in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request that implement SessionStore 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSessionStore 
      class  CookieBasedSessionStore
      Store session values in cookie, use a app-scope configured secret_key_base to encrypt data like Rails.
      class  SimpleMemorySessionStore
      use a in memory hash map to store session values
      Methods in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request that return SessionStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SessionStore SessionStoreResolver.defaultSessionStore()
      return a default session store instance, which is CookieBasedSessionStore
      static SessionStore SessionStoreHolder.get()
      get the global SessionStore instance
      SessionStore SessionStoreResolver.resolve()
      resolve session store from config, if user not config it must return a default session store.
      SessionStore SessionFacade.sessionStore() 
      protected SessionStore AbstractWebRequest.sessionStore()
      return application scoped SessionStore, if not configured in Config, must return a default one.
      Methods in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request with parameters of type SessionStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void SessionStoreHolder.set(SessionStore sessionStore)
      set global SessionStore instance
      Constructors in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request with parameters of type SessionStore 
      Constructor and Description
      SessionFacade(SessionStore store, WebRequest request)
